com.here.android.mpa.venues3d

Class Space

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.here.android.mpa.venues3d.SpatialObject
      • com.here.android.mpa.venues3d.Area
        • com.here.android.mpa.venues3d.Space

  • public final class Space
extends Area
    This class represents a physical space in a Venue (building), for example a shop in a shopping mall. When the VenueMapFragment is used, the Space is interactive and the application user can tap on it.
    See Also:
    Content, Venue

    • Nested Class Summary

      Nested Classes 
      Modifier and Type Class and Description
      static class  Space.SpaceType
      This enumeration defines identifiers for space types.

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Concrete Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      Content getContent()
      This method obtains the Content object associated with the given Space instance.
      int getFloorNumber()
      This method retrieves the floor number assigned to the given Level.
      java.lang.String getFloorSynonym()
      This method retrieves the floor synonym, for example: 1, B, P1, MEZZ etc.
      android.graphics.Bitmap getIcon(android.content.Context context)
      This method obtains the icon used to indicate the given space on the map.
      java.lang.String getIconUri()
      Gets the String representation of the URI for a Space.getIcon(Context).
      Space.SpaceType getType()
      This method obtains the space type assigned to the given object.
      java.lang.String getVenueName()
      This method obtains the name of the Venue in which the given space is located.

    • Method Detail

      • getContent

        public Content getContent()
        This method obtains the Content object associated with the given Space instance.
        Returns:
        An object representing the content of the given Space instance.

      • getFloorNumber

        public int getFloorNumber()
        This method retrieves the floor number assigned to the given Level. Note that 0 (zero) indicates the ground floor, negative values indicate underground floors and positive values indicate floors above ground level.
        Returns:
        A value indicating the floor number.

      • getFloorSynonym

        public java.lang.String getFloorSynonym()
        This method retrieves the floor synonym, for example: 1, B, P1, MEZZ etc.
        Returns:
        A string object containing the floor synonym.

      • getVenueName

        public java.lang.String getVenueName()
        This method obtains the name of the Venue in which the given space is located.
        Returns:
        A string containing the name of the venue.

      • getType

        public Space.SpaceType getType()
        This method obtains the space type assigned to the given object. Use this method to determine if the space is a facility.
        Returns:
        An object indicating the Space.SpaceType.

      • getIcon

        public android.graphics.Bitmap getIcon(android.content.Context context)
        This method obtains the icon used to indicate the given space on the map.
        Parameters:
        context - An object representing the context of the application.
        Returns:
        A Bitmap object representing the icon or null if the Space does not use an icon.

      • getIconUri

        public java.lang.String getIconUri()
        Gets the String representation of the URI for a Space.getIcon(Context).
        Returns:
        The URI to a Space's icon. Returns an empty string, if the Space doesn't have any icon.
